statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE energy_produced > 100;
SELECT id, energy_produced, energy_consumed, date FROM EnergyUsageData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_consumed FROM EnergyUsageData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, date, energy_produced FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT date, energy_consumed, energy_produced FROM EnergyUsageData WHERE energy_consumed < energy_produced
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed, energy_produced FROM EnergyUsageData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, MONTH(date), SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_consumed FROM EnergyUsageData GROUP BY id, MONTH(date) HAVING total_consumed > 500
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsagePatterns ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE solar_energy_generated > 100 AND wind_energy_generated < 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyUsagePatterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyProduction ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_energy_usage FROM EnergyUsagePatterns;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsagePatterns WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM EnergyUsagePatterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE solar_energy_generated > wind_energy_generated AND timestamp > '2021-03-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, timestamp, wind_energy_generated FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE wind_energy_generated < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, solar_energy_generated FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE solar_energy_generated > 100 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-04-01' AND '2021-05-01' ORDER BY solar_energy_generated DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_source='Solar'
SELECT energy_value FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM optimization_results ORDER BY optimization_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, energy_source FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_value > 100
SELECT id, date, energy_value FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, optimization_type, optimization_score FROM optimization_results WHERE optimization_score > 0.8 ORDER BY optimization_score DESC
SELECT id, date, energy_source, energy_value FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY energy_value DESC
SELECT id, date, optimization_type, optimization_score FROM optimization_results WHERE optimization_type = 'Efficiency' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT date, time, energy_usage FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE energy_production > 100;
SELECT location, temperature FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM EnergySources WHERE source_type = 'solar';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM WeatherData GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temperature > 25;
SELECT location, source_name FROM EnergySources JOIN RenewableEnergyProduction ON EnergySources.source_id = RenewableEnergyProduction.source_id;
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, date, energy_usage FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE energy_production > 100;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM EnergySources ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT id, date, peak_usage + off_peak_usage AS total_usage FROM EnergyUsagePatterns;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, energy_usage FROM RenewableEnergyProduction WHERE energy_production > 100 ORDER BY energy_production DESC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_name, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM EnergySources GROUP BY source_name HAVING total_capacity > 500 ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT date, peak_usage, off_peak_usage FROM EnergyUsagePatterns WHERE peak_usage > off_peak_usage AND off_peak-usage > 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 7;
